CVE-2009-1870.body: Adobe Flash Player and Adobe AIR are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Very few details are available regarding this issue. We will update this BID as more information emerges.Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.This issue was previously covered in BID 35890 (Adobe Flash Player and AIR Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.UPDATE (September 4, 2009): Mac OS X 10.6 reportedly ships with Flash Player 10.0.23.1, which will overwrite any installed version of Flash Player when Mac OS X is being installed.This issue affects versions *prior to* the following:Flash Player 10.0.32.18AIR 1.5.2

CVE-2009-1882.title: ImageMagick TIFF File Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1882.body: ImageMagick is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input. The vulnerability occurs when handling malformed TIFF files.Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of a user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.The following are vulnerable: ImageMagick prior to 6.5.2-9GraphicsMagick 1.2.x (prior to 1.2.10)GraphicsMagick 1.3.x (prior to 1.3.8)

CVE-2009-1884.title: 'Compress::Raw::Bzip2' Perl Module Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1884.body: The 'Compress::Raw::Bzip2' Perl module is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause denial-of-service conditions in applications that use the vulnerable module.Versions prior to 'Compress::Raw::Bzip2' 2.019 are affected.

CVE-2009-1885.title: Xerces-C++ Nested DTD Structure XML Parsing Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1885.body: Xerces-C++ is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to handle certain XML data structures.Exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to cause denial-of-service conditions in the context of an application using the vulnerable XML parsing library.Xerces-C++ 3.0.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-1888.title: Samba Format String And Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1888.body: Samba is prone to multiple vulnerabilities.Attackers can leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the vulnerable application or to bypass certain security restrictions.Samba 3.0.31 through 3.3.5 are affected.

CVE-2009-1889.title: Pidgin OSCAR Protocol Web Message Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1889.body: Pidgin is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input.Successful exploits will cause the affected application to crash, effectively denying service to legitimate users.Pidgin 2.4.0 through 2.5.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1890.title: Apache 'mod_proxy' Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1890.body: The Apache 'mod_proxy' module is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow remote attackers to cause denial-of-service conditions and prevent legitimate users from accessing the services.

CVE-2009-1898.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1898.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server (WAS) is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including security-bypass, information-disclosure, and other unspecified issues.Attackers can leverage these issues to bypass security measures or obtain sensitive information that can aid in further attacks.Versions in the 6.0.2.x branch prior to WAS 6.0.2.35 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1900.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1900.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server (WAS) is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including security-bypass, information-disclosure, and other unspecified issues.Attackers can leverage these issues to bypass security measures or obtain sensitive information that can aid in further attacks.Versions in the 6.0.2.x branch prior to WAS 6.0.2.35 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1902.title: ModSecurity Multiple Remote Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1902.body: ModSecurity is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the Apache webserver and deny service to legitimate users. These issues affect versions prior to ModSecurity 2.5.9.

CVE-2009-1904.title: Ruby BigDecimal Library Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1904.body: Ruby is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability in its BigDecimal library.Successful exploits may allow remote attackers to cause denial-of-service conditions in applications that use the vulnerable module. Versions prior to Ruby 1.8.6-p369 and 1.8.7-p173 are affected.

CVE-2009-1905.title: IBM DB2 Denial of Service And Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1905.body: IBM DB2 is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including a denial-of-service issue and a security-bypass issue.Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions or to crash the application, causing a denial-of-service condition.These issues affect versions prior to DB2 9.5 Fixpak 4 and 9.1 Fixpack 7.

CVE-2009-1905.title: IBM DB2 Multiple Unspecified Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1905.body: IBM DB2 is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities. The impact of some of these issues is unknown. In some cases, an attacker may perform unauthorized actions.The following are affected:DB2 9.1 prior to FP8DB2 9.5 prior to FP4

CVE-2009-1907.title: Claroline 'claroline/linker/notfound.php' Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1907.body: Claroline is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Claroline 1.8.11 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-1908.title: SKIP Unspecified SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1908.body: SKIP is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to SKIP 1.0.3 are affected.

CVE-2009-1909.title: SKIP Unspecified SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1909.body: SKIP is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to SKIP 1.0.3 are affected.

CVE-2009-1910.title: RTWebalbum 'AlbumId' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1910.body: RTWebalbum is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.RTWebalbum 1.0.462 is affected; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1911.title: TinyWebGallery '/admin/_include/init.php' Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1911.body: TinyWebGallery is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to view files and execute local scripts in the context of the webserver process. This may aid in further attacks.TinyWebGallery 1.7.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-1912.title: webSPELL 'getlang.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1912.body: webSPELL is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to webSPELL 4.2.0f are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1913.title: LuxBum 'manager.php' Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1913.body: LuxBum is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting these issues can allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.LuxBum 0.5.5/stable is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-1914.title: Linux Kernel '/proc/iomem' Sparc64 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1914.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability that attackers can exploit to cause an affected computer to crash.This issue affects the Linux kernel 2.6.22-rc1 through 2.6.29 on the sparc64 architecture.

CVE-2009-1915.title: ICQ 'ICQToolBar.dll' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1915.body: ICQ is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause an affected application (e.g. Windows Explorer) to crash, effectively denying service. Attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.ICQ 6.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-1917.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Deleted 'timeChildren' Object Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1917.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability that affects a 'timeChildren' object from the HTML+TIME web standard.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the browser. Successful exploits will compromise the browser and possibly the computer. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2009-1918.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Table Object Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1918.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the browser. Successful exploits will compromise the browser and possibly the computer. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2009-1929.title: Microsoft Remote Desktop Connection ActiveX Control Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1929.body: Microsoft Remote Desktop Connection ActiveX control is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.Attackers may exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting victim to view a malicious webpage. Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application that uses the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-1932.title: GStreamer gst-plugins-good 'gstpngdec.c' PNG Output Buffer Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1932.body: GStreamer 'gst-plugins-good' is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data before using it to allocate memory buffers.Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied code to run in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed attacks will result in denial-of-service conditions.This issue affects gst-plugins-good 0.10.15; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-1934.title: Sun Java System Web Server Reverse Proxy Plug-in Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1934.body: Sun Java System Web Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of a site that uses the affected functionality. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.This issue affects Sun Java System Web Server 6.1 SPARC, x86, Linux, Windows, HP-UX, and AIX platforms.

CVE-2009-1935.title: FreeBSD Direct Pipe Write Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1935.body: FreeBSD is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2009-1938.title: Joomla! Prior to 1.5.11 Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1938.body: Joomla! is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and HTML-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. These issues affect the 'com_user' component, the 'JA_Purity' template, and the administrative panel in the 'Site client' subproject of the application.An attacker can exploit these issues to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Joomla!1.5.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1939.title: Joomla! Prior to 1.5.11 Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1939.body: Joomla! is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and HTML-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. These issues affect the 'com_user' component, the 'JA_Purity' template, and the administrative panel in the 'Site client' subproject of the application.An attacker can exploit these issues to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Joomla!1.5.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1940.title: Joomla! Prior to 1.5.11 Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1940.body: Joomla! is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and HTML-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. These issues affect the 'com_user' component, the 'JA_Purity' template, and the administrative panel in the 'Site client' subproject of the application.An attacker can exploit these issues to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Joomla!1.5.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1942.title: Drupal Quiz Module HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1942.body: The Quiz module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Quiz 6.x-2.2 and 6.x-3.0 are vulnerable.http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2009-1943.title: SafeNet SoftRemote IKE Service Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1943.body: SafeNet SoftRemote is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized memory buffer.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successfully exploiting this issue will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.Versions prior to SoftRemote 10.8.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1947.title: Unclassified NewsBoard Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1947.body: Unclassified NewsBoard is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including an SQL-injection issue, multiple information-disclosure issues, and a local file-include issue.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- access or modify data- exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database- obtain sensitive information- execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserverA successful attack will compromise the application and may help in further attacks.The issues affect Unclassified NewsBoard 1.6.4; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1948.title: Unclassified NewsBoard Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1948.body: Unclassified NewsBoard is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including an SQL-injection issue, multiple information-disclosure issues, and a local file-include issue.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- access or modify data- exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database- obtain sensitive information- execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserverA successful attack will compromise the application and may help in further attacks.The issues affect Unclassified NewsBoard 1.6.4; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1949.title: Unclassified NewsBoard Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1949.body: Unclassified NewsBoard is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including an SQL-injection issue, multiple information-disclosure issues, and a local file-include issue.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- access or modify data- exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database- obtain sensitive information- execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserverA successful attack will compromise the application and may help in further attacks.The issues affect Unclassified NewsBoard 1.6.4; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1956.title: Apache APR-util 'apr_brigade_vprintf' Off By One Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1956.body: Apache 'APR-util' is prone to an off-by-one vulnerability that may allow attackers to obtain sensitive information or trigger a denial-of-service condition. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code in the context of an application that uses the affected library, but this has not been confirmed. Versions prior to 'APR-util' 1.3.5 on big-endian platforms are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1957.title: strongSwan IKE Request Multiple Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1957.body: strongSwan is prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities because it fail to properly handle certain IKE packets.Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the IKEv2 charon daemon, denying access to legitimate users.Versions prior to strongSwan 4.3.1 and 4.2.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1958.title: strongSwan IKE Request Multiple Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-1958.body: strongSwan is prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities because it fail to properly handle certain IKE packets.Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the IKEv2 charon daemon, denying access to legitimate users.Versions prior to strongSwan 4.3.1 and 4.2.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-1959.title: Irssi 'WALLOPS' Message Off By One Heap Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2009-1959.body: Irssi is prone to an off-by-one, heap-based, memory-corruption vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into a memory buffer.Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the vulnerable client, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to run arbitrary code within the context of the vulnerable application, but this has not been confirmed.Iirssi 0.8.13 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2004.title: Dokeos Multiple Remote Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2004.body: Dokeos is prone to multiple input-validation vulnerabilities ,including SQL-injection, HTML-injection, cross-site scripting, and cross-site request-forgery issues.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserver, compromise the application, obtain sensitive information, steal cookie-based authentication credentials from legitimate users of the site, modify the way the site is rendered, perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of a user, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Dokeos 1.8.5 is affected; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2006.title: Dokeos Multiple Remote Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2006.body: Dokeos is prone to multiple input-validation vulnerabilities ,including SQL-injection, HTML-injection, cross-site scripting, and cross-site request-forgery issues.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserver, compromise the application, obtain sensitive information, steal cookie-based authentication credentials from legitimate users of the site, modify the way the site is rendered, perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of a user, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Dokeos 1.8.5 is affected; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2007.body: Dokeos is prone to multiple input-validation vulnerabilities ,including SQL-injection, HTML-injection, cross-site scripting, and cross-site request-forgery issues.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserver, compromise the application, obtain sensitive information, steal cookie-based authentication credentials from legitimate users of the site, modify the way the site is rendered, perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of a user, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Dokeos 1.8.5 is affected; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2008.body: Dokeos is prone to multiple input-validation vulnerabilities ,including SQL-injection, HTML-injection, cross-site scripting, and cross-site request-forgery issues.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserver, compromise the application, obtain sensitive information, steal cookie-based authentication credentials from legitimate users of the site, modify the way the site is rendered, perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of a user, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Dokeos 1.8.5 is affected; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2009.body: Dokeos is prone to multiple input-validation vulnerabilities ,including SQL-injection, HTML-injection, cross-site scripting, and cross-site request-forgery issues.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserver, compromise the application, obtain sensitive information, steal cookie-based authentication credentials from legitimate users of the site, modify the way the site is rendered, perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of a user, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Dokeos 1.8.5 is affected; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2011.title: Worldweaver DX Studio Player Browser Plugin Remote Arbitrary Shell Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2011.body: Worldweaver DX Studio Player is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input data.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary shell commands in the context of the vulnerable application. Versions prior to DX Studio Player 3.0.29.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2014.title: Joomla! ComSchool Component 'classid' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2014.body: The Joomla! ComSchool component is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.ComSchool 1.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2026.title: Computer Associates Multiple Products Data Transport Services Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2026.body: Multiple Computer Associates products are prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because they fails to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition.The issue affects the following:CA Software Delivery r11.2 C1CA Software Delivery r11.2 C2CA Software Delivery r11.2 C3CA Software Delivery r11.2 SP4Unicenter Software Delivery 4.0 C3CA Advantage Data Transport 3.0 C1CA IT Client Manager r12

CVE-2009-2027.title: Apple Safari Windows Installer Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2027.body: Apple Safari is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker may be able to exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges, which may aid in further attacks. This issue affects versions prior to Safari 4.0 running on Microsoft Windows XP and Vista.NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 35260 (Apple Safari Prior to 4.0 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities), but has been assigned its own record to better document it.

CVE-2009-2042.title: Libpng 1-bit Interlaced Images Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2042.body: The 'libpng' library is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Successful exploits will allow an attacker to obtain potentially sensitive information.This issue affects versions prior to libpng 1.2.37.

CVE-2009-2043.title: Mozilla Firefox 'nsViewManager.cpp' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2043.body: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability.Successful exploits can allow attackers to crash the affected browser, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.Firefox 3.0.2 through 3.0.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2044.title: Mozilla Firefox Large GIF File Background Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2044.body: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits can allow attackers to crash the affected browser, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.Firefox 3.0.10 is affected; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2046.title: Cisco Video Surveillance 2500 Series IP Cameras Remote Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2046.body: Cisco Video Surveillance 2500 Series IP Cameras are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCsu05515 and CSCsr96497.Versions prior to Cisco Video Surveillance 2500 Series IP Camera firmware 2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2047.title: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express CRS Administration Interface Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2047.body: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to view, modify, or delete any file on the server through the CRS Administration interface. Successful exploits may lead to other attacks. This issue is tracked by Cisco BugID CSCsw76644.

CVE-2009-2048.title: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express (CCX) Arbitrary Script Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2048.body: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express (CCX) is prone to a vulnerability that allows attackers to execute arbitrary script code because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the user running the application, which may aid in further attacks.This issue is documented by Cisco Bug ID CSCsw76649.

CVE-2009-2061.title: Multiple Browsers Web Proxy Redirect Handling Man In The Middle Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2061.body: Multiple browsers are prone to a man-in-the-middle vulnerability.Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to aid in phishing attacks or to obtain sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible. Note that to take advantage of this issue, an attacker must be able to intercept or control network traffic. This would normally be possible through a man-in-the-middle attack, DNS poisoning, or similar vectors.The following are vulnerable:Mozilla Firefox prior to 3.0.10Apple Safari prior to 3.2.2Opera prior to 9.25Additional browsers may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2062.title: Multiple Browsers Web Proxy Redirect Handling Man In The Middle Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2062.body: Multiple browsers are prone to a man-in-the-middle vulnerability.Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to aid in phishing attacks or to obtain sensitive information. CVE-2009-2064.body: Multiple browsers are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because they fail to display warnings when pages operating in a secure context try to request resources through insecure methods.Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to aid in phishing attacks or to obtain sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible. Note that to take advantage of this issue, an attacker must be able to intercept or control network traffic. This would normally be possible through a man-in-the-middle attack, DNS poisoning, or similar vectors.The following are vulnerable:Microsoft Internet ExplorerMozilla FirefoxApple SafariOperaGoogle ChromeOther browsers may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2065.title: Multiple Browser HTTP Resource in HTTPS Context Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2065.body: Multiple browsers are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because they fail to display warnings when pages operating in a secure context try to request resources through insecure methods.Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to aid in phishing attacks or to obtain sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible. Note that to take advantage of this issue, an attacker must be able to intercept or control network traffic. This would normally be possible through a man-in-the-middle attack, DNS poisoning, or similar vectors.The following are vulnerable:Microsoft Internet ExplorerMozilla FirefoxApple SafariOperaGoogle ChromeOther browsers may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2066.title: Multiple Browser HTTP Resource in HTTPS Context Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2066.body: Multiple browsers are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because they fail to display warnings when pages operating in a secure context try to request resources through insecure methods.Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to aid in phishing attacks or to obtain sensitive information. CVE-2009-2071.title: Multiple Browsers Cached Certificate HTTP Site Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2071.body: Multiple browsers are prone to a vulnerability that may allow attackers to spoof arbitrary HTTPS sites.Attackers may exploit this vulnerability via a malicious webpage to spoof the origin of an HTTPS site. Successful exploits will lead to a false sensitive security since the victim is visiting a site that is assumed to be legitimate.

CVE-2009-2073.title: Linksys WRT160N Wireless Router Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2073.body: The Linksys WRT160N wireless router is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability.Successful exploits can run privileged commands on the affected device, including enabling remote access to the web administration interface. This may lead to further network-based attacks.Linksys WRT160N running firmware 1.02.2 is vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2074.title: Drupal Nodequeue Module Security Bypass and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2074.body: The Drupal Nodequeue module is prone to a security-bypass and a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user credentials and sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.The attacker may leverage the security-bypass issue to view or modify data, despite the attacker's insufficient privileges. The following are affected:Nodequeue for Drupal 5.x prior to 5.x-2.7Nodequeue for Drupal 6.x prior to 6.x-2.2

CVE-2009-2075.title: Drupal Nodequeue Module Security Bypass and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2075.body: The Drupal Nodequeue module is prone to a security-bypass and a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user credentials and sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.The attacker may leverage the security-bypass issue to view or modify data, despite the attacker's insufficient privileges. The following are affected:Nodequeue for Drupal 5.x prior to 5.x-2.7Nodequeue for Drupal 6.x prior to 6.x-2.2

CVE-2009-2076.title: Drupal Views Module Multiple Security Bypass and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2076.body: The Views module for Drupal is prone to multiple security-bypass and HTML-injection vulnerabilities.An attacker may exploit these vulnerabilities to bypass intended access controls or to render arbitrary HTML and script code in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Views 6.x-2.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2077.title: Drupal Views Module Multiple Security Bypass and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2077.body: The Views module for Drupal is prone to multiple security-bypass and HTML-injection vulnerabilities.An attacker may exploit these vulnerabilities to bypass intended access controls or to render arbitrary HTML and script code in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Views 6.x-2.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2078.title: Drupal Booktree Module Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2078.body: The Booktree module for Drupal is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.To exploit these issues, attackers must have privileges to create book pages.Versions prior to Booktree 5.x-7.3 and 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2079.title: Drupal Taxonomy Manager Administrative Page HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2079.body: The Taxonomy Manager module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Note that to exploit this issue, attackers require valid authentication credentials with 'administer taxonomy' privileges.http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2009-2083.title: Drupal Taxonomy Manager Administrative Page HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2083.body: The Taxonomy Manager module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Note that to exploit this issue, attackers require valid authentication credentials with 'administer taxonomy' privileges.http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2009-2091.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server for z/OS File Permission Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2091.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server (WAS) for z/OS is prone to a file-permission security issue.Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.This issue affects WAS 7.0 (prior to 7.0.0.5) for z/OS.

CVE-2009-2108.title: Git Parameter Processing Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2108.body: Git is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle some client requests.Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a daemon process to enter an infinite loop. Repeated exploits may consume excessive system resources, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.Git 1.4.4.5 through 1.6.3.2 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2119.title: F5 Networks FirePass SSL VPN 'password' Field Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2119.body: F5 Networks FirePass SSL VPN is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2009-2121.title: Google Chrome HTTP Response Handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2121.body: Google Chrome is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the browser. Successful exploits will compromise the browser and possibly the computer. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.This issue affects versions prior to Chrome 2.0.172.33.

CVE-2009-2122.title: WordPress Photoracer Plugin 'id' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2122.body: The Photoracer plugin for WordPress is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.The issue affects Photoracer 1.0; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2131.title: 4homepages 4images Multiple Cross Site Scripting And HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2131.body: 4homepages 4images is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.4images 1.7.7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2133.title: Pivot Multiple Cross Site Scripting And HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2133.body: Pivot is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.Pivot 1.40.4 and 1.40.7 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2139.title: OpenOffice EMF File Parser Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2139.body: OpenOffice is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability because the software fails to properly handle specially crafted files.An attacker could exploit this issue by enticing a victim to open a malicious document.Successful exploits would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user.NOTE: This issue may be related to the issues described in BID 36186 (OpenOffice Prior to 3.1.1 Multiple Unspecified Security Vulnerabilities). We will update this BID when more information becomes available.

CVE-2009-2147.body: phpWebThings is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.phpWebThings 1.5.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2176.title: fuzzylime (cms) Multiple Local File Include and Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2176.body: 'fuzzylime (cms)' is prone to multiple local file-include vulnerabilities and an arbitrary-file-overwrite vulnerability.An attacker can exploit these issues to overwrite arbitrary files, execute arbitrary local script code, and obtain sensitive information.These issues affect fuzzylime (cms) 3.03a; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2177.body: 'fuzzylime (cms)' is prone to multiple local file-include vulnerabilities and an arbitrary-file-overwrite vulnerability.An attacker can exploit these issues to overwrite arbitrary files, execute arbitrary local script code, and obtain sensitive information.These issues affect fuzzylime (cms) 3.03a; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2185.title: strongSwan Crafted X.509 Certificate Multiple Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2185.body: strongSwan is prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the application, denying access to legitimate users.Versions prior to strongSwan 2.8.10, 4.3.2, and 4.2.16 are vulnerable.UPDATE (July 27, 2009): Additional corrective measures were added to address these issues in strongSwan 2.8.11. 4.2.17, and 4.3.3.

CVE-2009-2188.title: Apple Mac OS X 2009-003 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2188.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities that have been addressed in Security Update 2009-003.The update addresses new vulnerabilities that affect the CFNetwork, ColorSync, CoreTypes, Dock, Image RAW, ImageIO, launchd, Login Window, MobileMe, Kernel, and XQuery components of Mac OS X. The advisory also contains security updates for seven previously reported issues.

CVE-2009-2190.title: Apple Mac OS X 2009-003 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2190.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities that have been addressed in Security Update 2009-003.The update addresses new vulnerabilities that affect the CFNetwork, ColorSync, CoreTypes, Dock, Image RAW, ImageIO, launchd, Login Window, MobileMe, Kernel, and XQuery components of Mac OS X. The advisory also contains security updates for seven previously reported issues.

CVE-2009-2193.title: Apple Mac OS X 2009-003 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2193.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities that have been addressed in Security Update 2009-003.The update addresses new vulnerabilities that affect the CFNetwork, ColorSync, CoreTypes, Dock, Image RAW, ImageIO, launchd, Login Window, MobileMe, Kernel, and XQuery components of Mac OS X. The advisory also contains security updates for seven previously reported issues.

CVE-2009-2195.title: WebKit Floating Point Number Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2195.body: WebKit is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.Versions prior to Apple Safari 4.0.3 are vulnerable; other applications using WebKit may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2198.title: Apple GarageBand Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2198.body: Apple GarageBand is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Exploiting the issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in tracking a user's web activities.This issue affects versions prior to GarageBand 5.1 for Mac OS X 10.5.7.

CVE-2009-2200.title: WebKit 'pluginspace' URI Scheme Remote Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2200.body: WebKit is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2009-2201.title: Apple Xsan Admin Error Message Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2201.body: Apple Xsan is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability affecting the Xsan Admin component.Successful exploits may allow attackers with physical access to an affected computer to obtain password data. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks.Versions prior to Xsan 2.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2203.title: Apple QuickTime Multiple Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2203.body: Apple QuickTime is prone to multiple vulnerabilities that may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.These issues arise when the application handles specially crafted H.264, MPEG-4, and FlashPix video files. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user; failed exploit attempts will cause denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to QuickTime 7.6.4 are vulnerable on Windows 7, Vista, XP, and Mac OS X platforms.

CVE-2009-2206.title: Apple iPhone and iPod Touch MP3 and AAC File Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2206.body: Apple iPhone and iPod touch are prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable device. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.This issue was previously covered in BID 36326 (Apple iPhone prior to 3.1 and iPod touch Prior to3.1.1 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.This issue affects the following:iPhone OS 1.0 through 3.0.1iPhone OS for iPod touch 1.1 through 3.0

CVE-2009-2207.title: Apple iPhone and iPod Touch MobileMail Component Delete Mail Access Validation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2207.body: Apple iPhone and iPod touch are prone to an access-validation vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.This issue was previously covered in BID 36326 (Apple iPhone prior to 3.1 and iPod touch Prior to 3.1.1 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.iPhone OS 1.0 through 3.0.1iPhone OS for iPod touch 1.1 through 3.0

CVE-2009-2208.title: FreeBSD IPv6 'SIOCSIFINFO_IN6' Permission Check Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2208.body: FreeBSD is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability because the software fails to properly check permissions when modifying IPv6 network stack properties.Attackers can exploit this issue to modify networking settings, which may result in a denial of service or may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2009-2214.title: Citrix Secure Gateway Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2214.body: Citrix Secure Gateway is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the server, denying access to legitimate users.Citrix Secure Gateway 3.1 and prior versions are affected.

CVE-2009-2216.title: DirectAdmin 'CMD_REDIRECT' Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2216.body: DirectAdmin is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.DirectAdmin 1.33.6 and prior versions are affected.

CVE-2009-2225.title: SureThing CD/DVD Labeler Playlist Parsing Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2225.body: SureThing CD/DVD Labeler is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input.Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.SureThing CD/DVD Labeler 5.1.616 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2232.title: Softbiz Ads 'image.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2232.body: Softbiz Ads is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-2234.title: VICIDIAL Call Center Suite 'admin.php' Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2234.body: VICIDIAL Call Center Suite is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.VICIDIAL Call Center Suite 2.0.5-173 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.NOTE: These issues do not arise on default installations of the VICIDIAL Call Center Suite; they occur only when support for non-Latin characters has been enabled through the configuration settings.

CVE-2009-2236.title: Your Articles Directory 'yad-admin/login.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2236.body: Your Articles Directory is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-2239.title: Joomla! Casino Component 'Itemid' Parameter Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2239.body: The Casino component for Joomla! is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Casino 0.3.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2240.title: Web Conference Room Free Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2240.body: Web Conference Room Free is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to Web Conference Room Free 1.6.4 are affected.

CVE-2009-2241.title: ASP Inline Corporate Calendar Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2241.body: ASP Inline Corporate Calendar is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-2242.title: ASP Inline Corporate Calendar Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2242.body: ASP Inline Corporate Calendar is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-2254.title: Zen Cart 'admin/sqlpatch.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2254.body: Zen Cart is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Note that the issue occurs only when the 'admin' directory wasn't properly renamed during the installation process.

CVE-2009-2255.title: Zen Cart 'record_company.php' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2255.body: Zen Cart is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because the software fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the webserver process.Note that the issue occurs only when the 'admin' directory wasn't properly renamed during the installation process. Zen Cart 1.3.8 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2275.title: cPanel 'lastvisit.html' Arbitrary File Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2275.body: cPanel is prone to a vulnerability that lets attacker access arbitrary files because it fails to adequately validate user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to view arbitrary local files on the victim's computer within the context of the webserver process.

CVE-2009-2291.title: Drupal LoginToboggan Module Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2291.body: The Drupal LoginToboggan module is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability because it fails to adequately limit access to blocked users in certain circumstances.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the application; other attacks may also possible. Versions prior to LoginToboggan 6.x-1.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2292.title: a-News Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2292.body: a-News is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.a-News 2.32 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2293.title: Tutorial Share Insecure Cookie Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2293.body: Tutorial Share is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately verify user-supplied input used for cookie-based authentication.Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to gain administrative access to the affected application, which may aid in further attacks.Tutorial Share 3.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2295.title: CamlImages PNG Image Parsing Multiple Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2295.body: CamlImages is prone to multiple integer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of applications that use the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.CamlImages 2.2 and prior are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2302.title: Aardvark Topsites PHP 'index.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2302.body: Aardvark Topsites PHP is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and to steal cookie-based authentication credentials.Aardvark Topsites PHP 5.2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2310.title: X-BLC 'get_read.php' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2310.body: X-BLC is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.X-BLC 0.2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2311.title: WBB3 rGallery 'userID' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2311.body: WBB3 rGallery is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.WBB3 rGallery 1.2.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2316.title: IBM Tivoli Identity Manager Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2316.body: Tivoli Identity Manager is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in an administrator's browser session in the context of the affected site. This could potentially allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials; other attacks are also possible.Tivoli Identity Manager 5.0 is vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2334.title: WordPress 'wp-admin/admin.php' Module Configuration Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2334.body: WordPress is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.Authenticated attackers may exploit this issue to gain access to configuration scripts, which may allow them to obtain sensitive information or elevate privileges; other attacks may also be possible.Versions prior to the following are vulnerable:WordPress 2.8.1WordPress MU 2.8.1

CVE-2009-2337.title: w3bcms Guestbook Module 'index.inc.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2337.body: w3bcms Guestbook module is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-2344.title: Sourcefire 3D Sensor and Defense Center 'user.cgi' Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2344.body: Sourcefire 3D Sensor and Defense Center are prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. An attacker may exploit these issues to gain administrative access to the vulnerable device, which may aid in further attacks.Versions prior to the following are vulnerable:Sourcefire 3D Sensor 4.8.2Sourcefire Defense Center 4.8.2

CVE-2009-2346.title: Asterisk IAX2 Call Number Space Exhaustion Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2346.body: Asterisk is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle an excessive amount of call numbers.Successful exploits can cause the application to stop accepting connections, resulting in denial-of-service conditions for legitimate users.

CVE-2009-2347.title: LibTIFF Multiple Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2347.body: LibTIFF is prone to multiple remote integer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary malicious code in the context of a user running an application that uses the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application.LibTIFF 3.8.2, 3.9, and 4.0 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2348.title: Open Handset Alliance Android Permission Verification Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2348.body: Android from Open Handset Alliance is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities because applications can bypass permission checks when they access certain resources.Successful exploits can allow an attacker to perform unauthorized actions on the affected device; other attacks are also possible.These issues affect all Android 1.5 CRBxx versions. These issues have been resolved in all Android 1.5 CBDxx, 1.5 CRCxx, and 1.5 COCxx versions.

CVE-2009-2360.title: Horde 'Passwd' Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2360.body: The Horde 'Passwd' module is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Versions prior to Horde 'Passwd' 3.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2361.title: osTicket Staff Username SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2361.body: osTicket is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to osTicket 1.6 RC5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2369.title: wxWidgets 'wxImage::Create()' Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2369.body: wxWidgets is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability.An attacker may exploit this issue by enticing victims into opening maliciously crafted JPEG files.Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context in the context of applications that use the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.wxWidgets 2.8.10 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2379.title: BIGACE Web CMS 'cmd' Parameter Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2379.body: BIGACE Web CMS is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain potentially sensitive information and execute arbitrary local scripts in the context of the webserver process. This may allow the attacker to compromise the application and the computer; other attacks are also possible.BIGACE Web CMS 2.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2380.title: 4homepages 4images Multiple Cross Site Scripting And HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2380.body: 4homepages 4images is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.4images 1.7.7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2383.title: WordPress Related Sites Plugin 'guid' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2383.body: The Related Sites plugin for WordPress is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Related Sites 2.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2385.title: Simple Machines Forum Member Awards 'index.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2385.body: The Member Awards module for Simple Machines Forum is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Member Awards 1.0.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2401.title: PHPEcho CMS SQL Injection and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2401.body: PHPEcho CMS is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability and an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage the HTML-injection issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is viewed, and launch other attacks. The attacker may exploit the SQL-injection issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.PHPEcho CMS 2.0-rc3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2404.title: Mozilla Firefox and Seamonkey Regular Expression Parsing Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2404.body: Mozilla Firefox and Seamonkey are prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability in the regular expression parser used to match common names in SSL certificates.Successfully exploiting this issue can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.Note that attackers need to exploit this issue with a crafted certificate that SeaMonkey trusts; otherwise, a warning message will be presented to the user.SeaMonkey 1.09 and Firefox 3.0.x are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.This issue is related to the vulnerability described by BID 35888 (Mozilla Firefox NULL Character CA SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability).

CVE-2009-2405.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2405.body: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and a local information-disclosure vulnerability.An attacker can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information or to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2009-2406.title: Linux Kernel eCryptfs 'parse_tag_11()' Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2406.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. This issue affects the eCryptfs filesystem.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successfully exploiting this issue will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-2407.title: eCryptfs 'parse_tag_3_packet()' Packet Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2407.body: eCryptfs is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges, resulting in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-2410.title: Fedora SSSD BE Database No Password Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2410.body: Fedora SSSD is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to affected computers. Successfully exploiting this issue may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2009-2411.title: Subversion Binary Delta Processing Multiple Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2411.body: Subversion is prone to multiple integer-overflow vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of Subversion clients and servers. Successful exploits will compromise the affected application and possibly the computer. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.The issues affect the following:Subversion clients and servers 1.5.6 and prior versions.Subversion clients and servers 1.6.0 through 1.6.3.

CVE-2009-2412.title: Apache APR and APR-util Multiple Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2412.body: Apache APR (Apache Portable Runtime) and 'APR-util' are prone to multiple integer-overflow vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of an application that uses the affected library. Successful exploits will compromise the affected application and possibly the computer. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2009-2414.title: libxml2 Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2414.body: The 'libxml2' library is prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues by tricking a victim into opening a specially crafted XML file. A successful attack can allow attacker-supplied code to run in the context of the application using the vulnerable library or can cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-2415.title: Memcached Multiple Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2415.body: Memcached is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges and compromise the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-2416.title: libxml2 Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2416.body: The 'libxml2' library is prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues by tricking a victim into opening a specially crafted XML file. A successful attack can allow attacker-supplied code to run in the context of the application using the vulnerable library or can cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-2417.title: cURL / libcURL NULL Character CA SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2417.body: cURL and libcURL are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because they fail to properly validate the domain name in a signed CA certificate, allowing attackers to substitute malicious SSL certificates for trusted ones.This issue affects cURL and libcURL when compiled against OpenSSL.Successful exploits allow attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.cURL and libcURL 7.4 through 7.19.5 are vulnerable. Additional applications that use the affected library may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2419.title: Apple Safari 'reload()' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2419.body: Apple Safari is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Given the nature of this issue, the attacker may also be able to run arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed. Safari 4.0 and 4.0.1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2422.title: Ruby on Rails 'http_authentication.rb' Nil Credentials Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2422.body: Ruby on Rails is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability because it fails to properly enforce access restrictions on certain requests to a site that requires authentication.An attacker can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to protected resources, which may lead to other attacks.Ruby on Rails 2.3.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2425.title: Tor Denial of Service and DNS Spoofing Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2425.body: Tor is prone to multiple vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to cause denial-of-service conditions or conduct spoofing attacks.These issues affect versions prior to Tor 0.2.0.35.

CVE-2009-2434.title: IBM AIX 'syscall' Unspecified Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2434.body: The IBM AIX 'syscall' functionality is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Further details have not been disclosed. We will update this BID as more information emerges.A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code as an affected process, possibly with kernel-level privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.This issue affects AIX 5.3.

CVE-2009-2443.title: Siteframe 'phpinfo.php' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2443.body: Siteframe is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to harvest sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.Siteframe 3.2.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-2444.title: RETIRED: ADbNewsSender 'path_to_lang' Parameter Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2444.body: ADbNewsSender is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain potentially sensitive information and execute arbitrary local scripts in the context of the webserver process. This may allow the attacker to compromise the application and the computer; other attacks are also possible.ADbNewsSender 1.5.5 and prior versions are affected.NOTE: This BID is retired because the issue isn't exploitable as described as long as recommended installation instructions are followed.

CVE-2009-2450.title: Online Armor Personal Firewall IOCTL Request Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2450.body: Online Armor Personal Firewall is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges, which may facilitate a complete compromise of the affected computer.Online Armor Personal Firewall 3.5.0.12 and prior versions are affected. Online Armor Personal Firewall AV+ is also vulnerable.

CVE-2009-2453.title: Citrix XenApp Unspecified Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-2453.body: Citrix XenApp (formerly Presentation Server) is prone to an unspecified security-bypass vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the resources. This issue affects Citrix XenApp 4.5 with Hotfix Rollup Pack 3 installed.

CVE-2009-2457.title: Novell eDirectory Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-2457.body: Novell eDirectory is prone to multiple buffer-overflow and denial-of-service vulnerabilities.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application or cause denial-of-service conditions.These issues affect eDirectory 8.8 SP3 and 8.8 SP3 FTF3.

CVE-2009-2462.body: The Mozilla Foundation has released multiple advisories to address vulnerabilities in Firefox.This BID is being retired; the following individual records now document these issues:34870 Pango 'pango_glyph_string_set_size()' Integer Overflow Vulnerability35765 Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird Multiple Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities35766 Mozilla Firefox 'setTimeout()' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability35767 Mozilla Firefox Flash Player Unloading Remote Code Execution Vulnerability35769 Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability35770 Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird Double Frame Construction Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities35772 Mozilla Firefox 'watch()' and ' __defineSetter__ ()' Functions Remote Code Execution Vulnerability35773 Mozilla Firefox 'XPCCrossOriginWrapper' Multiple Cross Domain Scripting Vulnerabilities35774 CoreGraphics Font Glyph Rendering Library Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities35775 Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird RDF File Handling Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability35776 Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird JavaScript Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
