CVE-2009-3001.title: Linux Kernel 'net/llc/af_llc.c' Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3001.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.NOTE: In kernel versions after 2.6.24.4, attackers must have the 'CAP_NET_RAW' capability to exploit this issue.

CVE-2009-3002.title: RETIRED: Linux Kernel 'net/appletalk/ddp.c' Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3002.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.NOTE: This BID is being retired because it is a duplicate of BID 36176 (Linux Kernel Multiple Protocols Local Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities).

CVE-2009-3009.title: Ruby on Rails Form Helpers Unicode String Handling Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3009.body: Ruby on Rails is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacksNOTE: The vendor has reported that this issue may also lead to HTML-injection attacks in some configurations.Ruby on Rails 2.x.x (prior to 2.3.4 and 2.2.3) are affected.

CVE-2009-3026.title: Pidgin 'protocols/jabber/auth.c' JABBER Server XMPP Specifications Man In The Middle Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3026.body: Pidgin is prone to a man-in-the-middle vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to sniff instant-messaging sessions and obtain potentially sensitive information.Pidgin 2.6.0 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3027.title: Symantec Veritas VRTSweb Incoming Data Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3027.body: Symantec Veritas VRTSweb is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers.

CVE-2009-3029.title: Symantec SecurityExpressions Audit and Compliance Server Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3029.body: Symantec SecurityExpressions Audit and Compliance Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. SecurityExpressions Audit and Compliance Server 4.1.1 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3030.title: Symantec SecurityExpressions Audit and Compliance Server Error Message HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3030.body: Symantec SecurityExpressions Audit and Compliance Server is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits would allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script and HTML code in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.SecurityExpressions Audit and Compliance Server 4.1.1 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3033.title: Multiple Symantec Altiris Products 'RunCmd()' ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3033.body: Symantec Altiris Notification Server, Symantec Management Platform, and Altiris Deployment Solution are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the applications' web console uses an ActiveX control provided by 'AeXNSConsoleUtilities.dll' that fails to properly validate user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Failed attacks will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2009-3041.title: SPIP Versions Prior to 2.0.9 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3041.body: SPIP is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to compromise the application and possibly the underlying webserver.Versions prior to SPIP 2.0.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3043.title: Linux Kernel 'drivers/char/tty_ldisc.c' NULL Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3043.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected kernel, denying service to legitimate users. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed. This issue was introduced in Linux kernel 2.6.26 and fixed in 2.6.31-rc8.

CVE-2009-3053.title: Agora 'action' Parameter Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3053.body: Agora is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain potentially sensitive information and execute arbitrary local scripts in the context of the webserver process. This may allow the attacker to compromise the application and the underlying computer; other attacks are also possible.Agora 3.0.0b is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3054.title: Joomla! Art Portal Component 'portalid' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3054.body: The Art Portal component for Joomla! is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to Art Portal 1.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3077.title: Mozilla Firefox MFSA 2009-47, -48, -49, -50, -51 Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3077.body: The Mozilla Foundation has released multiple advisories to address vulnerabilities in Firefox.An attacker can exploit these issues to obtain potentially sensitive information, execute arbitrary code, elevate privileges, and cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2009-3078.title: Mozilla Firefox MFSA 2009-47, -48, -49, -50, -51 Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3078.body: The Mozilla Foundation has released multiple advisories to address vulnerabilities in Firefox.An attacker can exploit these issues to obtain potentially sensitive information, execute arbitrary code, elevate privileges, and cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2009-3079.title: Mozilla Firefox MFSA 2009-47, -48, -49, -50, -51 Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3079.body: The Mozilla Foundation has released multiple advisories to address vulnerabilities in Firefox.An attacker can exploit these issues to obtain potentially sensitive information, execute arbitrary code, elevate privileges, and cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2009-3086.title: Ruby on Rails Message Digest Verification Security Weakness
CVE-2009-3086.body: Ruby on Rails is prone to a weakness in the way it verifies message digests in the cookie store. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to determine when a forged signature is partially correct and then forge a message digest.The issue affects versions prior to Ruby on Rails 2.3.4 and 2.2.3.

CVE-2009-3103.title: Microsoft Windows SMB2 '_Smb2ValidateProviderCallback()' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3103.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability when processing the protocol headers for the Server Message Block (SMB) Negotiate Protocol Request.NOTE: Reportedly, for this issue to be exploitable, file sharing must be enabled.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute code with SYSTEM-level privileges; failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.Windows 7 RC, Vista and 2008 Server are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.NOTE: Reportedly, Windows XP and 2000 are not affected.UPDATE (September 9, 2009): Symantec has confirmed the issue on Windows Vista SP1 and Windows Server 2008.

CVE-2009-3104.title: Multiple Symantec Products Email Handling Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3104.body: Multiple Symantec products are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability when processing specially crafted email messages.An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions and launch further attacks.The following products are affected:Norton AntiVirusNorton Internet SecuritySymantec AntiVirus Corporate EditionSymantec Client Security

CVE-2009-3105.title: IBM Lotus Domino Web Access Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3105.body: IBM Lotus Domino Web Access (iNotes) is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.IBM Lotus Domino Web Access (iNotes) 8.0.1 is affected.

CVE-2009-3107.title: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution 'DBManager' Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3107.body: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution is prone to a vulnerability that allows an attacker to bypass authentication and gain unauthorized access to the affected application. Attackers with authorized network access can exploit this issue to bypass 'DBManager' authentication. Successful exploits may allow attackers to modify Altiris database data on the targeted computer.Versions prior to Altiris Deployment Solution 6.9 SP3 Build 430 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3108.title: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution 'Aclient' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3108.body: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security settings and gain privileged access. Successfully exploiting this issue can result in a compromise of the application.Versions prior to Altiris Deployment Solution 6.9 SP3 Build 430 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3121.title: Drupal Ajax Table Module Security Bypass and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3121.body: Drupal Ajax Table module is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, or perform unauthorized actions; other attacks may also be possible.Ajax Table 5.x is vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3122.title: Drupal Ajax Table Module Security Bypass and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3122.body: Drupal Ajax Table module is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, or perform unauthorized actions; other attacks may also be possible.Ajax Table 5.x is vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3125.title: Mozilla Bugzilla 'Bug.search()' WebService Function SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3125.body: Bugzilla is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.The following versions are affected:Bugzilla 3.3.2 through 3.4.1Bugzilla 3.5

CVE-2009-3129.title: Microsoft Excel 'FEATHEADER' Record Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3129.body: Microsoft Excel is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing victims into opening a specially crafted Excel ('.xls') file.Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

CVE-2009-3135.title: Microsoft Word Record Parsing Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3135.body: Microsoft Word is prone to a remote stack-buffer overflow vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing victims into opening a specially crafted Word ('.doc') file.Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

CVE-2009-3152.title: NTSOFT BBS E-Market Professional Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3152.body: NTSOFT BBS E-Market Professional is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2009-3156.title: Multiple Drupal Modules Date Wizard HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3156.body: Multiple Drupal modules are prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the applications fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.The following modules and versions are affected:Date 6.x-2.2Calendar 6.x-2Views 6.x-2.6

CVE-2009-3157.title: Multiple Drupal Modules Date Wizard HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3157.body: Multiple Drupal modules are prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the applications fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.The following modules and versions are affected:Date 6.x-2.2Calendar 6.x-2Views 6.x-2.6

CVE-2009-3165.title: Mozilla Bugzilla 'Bug.create()' WebService Function SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3165.body: Bugzilla is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.The following versions are vulnerable:Bugzilla 2.23.4 through 3.0.8Bugzilla 3.1.1 through 3.2.4Bugzilla 3.3.1 through 3.4.1

CVE-2009-3200.title: Qnap Storage Devices Unauthorized Access Vulnerability and Security Weakness
CVE-2009-3200.body: Qnap Storage Devices are prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability and a security weakness that may allow the device to generate weak random numbers.An attacker can exploit the unauthorized-access issue to decrypt the hard disk by using the key stored in flash memory. The attacker can exploit the security weakness in conjunction with other latent vulnerabilities to gain unauthorized access to the affected device. TS-239 Pro and TS-639 Pro firmware versions 3.1.1 0815, 3.1.0 0627, and 2.1.7 0613 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3230.title: PostgreSQL Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3230.body: PostgreSQL is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including a denial-of-service issue, a privilege-escalation issue, and an authentication-bypass issue. Attackers can exploit these issues to shut down affected servers, perform certain actions with elevated privileges, and bypass authentication mechanisms to perform unauthorized actions. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2009-3231.title: PostgreSQL Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3231.body: PostgreSQL is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including a denial-of-service issue, a privilege-escalation issue, and an authentication-bypass issue. Attackers can exploit these issues to shut down affected servers, perform certain actions with elevated privileges, and bypass authentication mechanisms to perform unauthorized actions. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2009-3232.title: Ubuntu PAM Authentication Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3232.body: Ubuntu PAM is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the software fails to properly check access permissions. Attackers can exploit this issue to authenticate as a user with arbitrary privileges.

CVE-2009-3235.title: Dovecot Sieve Plugin Multiple Unspecified Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3235.body: Dovecot Sieve plugin is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application or to cause denial-of-service conditions.No further details are currently available. We will update this BID as more information emerges.These issues affect versions prior to Dovecot Sieve 1.1.7 and 1.0.4.

CVE-2009-3244.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Multiple Remote Code Execution and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3244.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is prone to a multiple remote code-execution and denial-of-service vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user and to cause denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to Shockwave Player 11.5.2.602 for Microsoft Windows and Apple Mac OS X are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3245.title: OpenSSL 'bn_wexpend()' Error Handling Unspecified Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3245.body: OpenSSL is prone to an unspecified vulnerability. Very few details are available regarding this issue. We will update this BID as more information emerges. Versions prior to OpenSSL 0.9.8m are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3266.title: Opera Unspecified Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3266.body: Opera is prone to an unspecified security-bypass vulnerability.The issue may allow attacker-supplied script code to perform certain actions with elevated privileges and manipulate arbitrary feeds in the Opera browser.Opera 9 and 10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3266.title: Opera Web Browser prior to 10.01 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3266.body: Opera Web Browser is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code, bypass certain security restrictions, or perform spoofing attacks.Versions prior to Opera 10.01 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3271.title: Apple iPhone Safari 'tel:' URI Handling Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3271.body: The Safari browser on the Apple iPhone is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to crash the application.This issue affects Apple iPhone 3.0.1; other versions may be vulnerable as well.

CVE-2009-3273.title: Apple iPhone and iPod touch Email SSL Certificate Validation Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3273.body: Apple iPhone and iPod touch are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to perform man-in-the-middle attacks by impersonating a trusted server. This may allow the attacker to obtain credentials or other sensitive information or give users a false sense of security. Information harvested may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2009-3280.title: Linux Kernel 'find_ie()' Function Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3280.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the kernel to end up in an infinite loop, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2009-3296.title: CamlImages JPEG Handling Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3296.body: The CamlImages library is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running an application that relies on the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. This issue affects CamlImages 2.2; other versions may be vulnerable as well.

CVE-2009-3298.title: Mahara Admin Password Reset Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3298.body: Mahara is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately restrict access to the password-reset feature.An attacker can exploit this issue to reset the application's administrator password.Versions prior to Mahara 1.0.13 and 1.1.7 are affected.

CVE-2009-3299.title: Mahara Resume Blocktype Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3299.body: Mahara is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.This issue affects versions prior to Mahara 1.0.13 and 1.1.7.

CVE-2009-3301.title: OpenOffice Prior to 3.2 Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3301.body: OpenOffice is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities because of errors in processing certain files.Remote attackers can exploit these issues by enticing victims into opening maliciously crafted files.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial of service.Versions prior to OpenOffice 3.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3302.title: OpenOffice Prior to 3.2 Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3302.body: OpenOffice is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities because of errors in processing certain files.Remote attackers can exploit these issues by enticing victims into opening maliciously crafted files.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial of service.Versions prior to OpenOffice 3.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3303.title: GForge 'helpname' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3303.body: GForge is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.GForge 4.5.14 and 4.7rc2 are affected; other versions may be affected as well.

CVE-2009-3305.title: Polipo Multiple Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3305.body: Polipo is prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the application, denying access to legitimate users. All versions of Polipo are considered vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3309.title: CF Shopkart 'ItemID' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3309.body: CF Shopkart is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.CF Shopkart 5.4 beta is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3310.title: Zainu 'album_id' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3310.body: Zainu is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Zainu 1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3315.title: nePHP Publisher SQL Login SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3315.body: nePHP Publisher is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.nePHP Publisherr 3.5.9 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3316.title: JForJoomla JReservation Joomla! Component 'pid' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3316.body: The JForJoomla JReservation component for Joomla! is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-3317.title: OpenSiteAdmin 'pages/pageHeader.php' Remote File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3317.body: OpenSiteAdmin is prone to a remote file-include vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to compromise the application and the underlying system; other attacks are also possible.OpenSiteAdmin 0.9.7 BETA is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3321.title: SaphpLesson 'CLIENT_IP' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3321.body: SaphpLesson is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.SaphpLesson 4.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3347.title: D-Link DIR-400 Unspecified Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3347.body: D-Link DIR-400 is prone to an unspecified remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it into an insufficiently sized memory buffer.Exploiting this vulnerability may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected device.

CVE-2009-3363.title: Drupal BUEditor Live Preview Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3363.body: BUEditor is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and to steal cookie-based authentication credentials.

CVE-2009-3364.title: FTPShell Client 'CWD' Command Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3364.body: FTPShell Client is prone to remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition.FTPShell Client 4.1 RC2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3385.title: Mozilla SeaMonkey Scriptable Plugin Content Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3385.body: Mozilla SeaMonkey is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass restrictions, which may allow them to obtain sensitive information or launch other attacks.Mozilla SeaMonkey versions prior to 1.1.19 are affected.

CVE-2009-3386.title: Bugzilla Bug Alias Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3386.body: Bugzilla is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.The issue may allow attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information that may aid in other attacks.The issue affects the following: Bugzilla 3.3.2 through 3.4.3 Bugzilla 3.5 through 3.5.1

CVE-2009-3387.title: Bugzilla Group Selection During Bug Move Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3387.body: Bugzilla is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Exploits may allow attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information that may aid in other attacks.This issue affects the following:Bugzilla 3.3.1 through 3.4.4Bugzilla 3.5.1Bugzilla 3.5.2

CVE-2009-3388.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey 'liboggplay' Media Library Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3388.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey are prone to multiple remote memory-corruption vulnerabilities.Successful exploits can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running an affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: These issues were previously covered in BID 37349 (Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey MFSA 2009-65 through -71 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but have been assigned their own record to better document them.

CVE-2009-3388.title: RETIRED: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey MFSA 2009-65 through -71 Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3388.body: The Mozilla Foundation has released multiple advisories to address vulnerabilities in Firefox and SeaMonkey.NOTE: This BID is being retired; the following individual records now document these issues:37361 Mozilla Firefox CVE-2009-3979 Multiple Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities37362 Mozilla Firefox CVE-2009-3980 Multiple Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities37363 Mozilla Firefox CVE-2009-3981 Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability37364 Mozilla Firefox CVE-2009-3982 JavaScript Engine Multiple Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities37369 Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey 'liboggplay' Media Library Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities37368 Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey Theora Video Library Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability37366 Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey NTLM Credential Reflection Authentication Bypass Vulnerability37367 Mozilla Firefox and Sea Monkey Insecure Protocol Location Bar Spoofing Vulnerability37370 Mozilla Firefox and Sea Monkey Content Injection Spoofing Vulnerability37365 Mozilla Firefox 'window.opener' Property Chrome Privilege Escalation Vulnerability37360 Mozilla Firefox/SeaMonkey GeckoActiveXObject Exception Message COM Object Enumeration Vulnerability

CVE-2009-3389.title: RETIRED: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey MFSA 2009-65 through -71 Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3389.body: The Mozilla Foundation has released multiple advisories to address vulnerabilities in Firefox and SeaMonkey.NOTE: This BID is being retired; the following individual records now document these issues:37361 Mozilla Firefox CVE-2009-3979 Multiple Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities37362 Mozilla Firefox CVE-2009-3980 Multiple Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities37363 Mozilla Firefox CVE-2009-3981 Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability37364 Mozilla Firefox CVE-2009-3982 JavaScript Engine Multiple Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities37369 Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey 'liboggplay' Media Library Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities37368 Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey Theora Video Library Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability37366 Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey NTLM Credential Reflection Authentication Bypass Vulnerability37367 Mozilla Firefox and Sea Monkey Insecure Protocol Location Bar Spoofing Vulnerability37370 Mozilla Firefox and Sea Monkey Content Injection Spoofing Vulnerability37365 Mozilla Firefox 'window.opener' Property Chrome Privilege Escalation Vulnerability37360 Mozilla Firefox/SeaMonkey GeckoActiveXObject Exception Message COM Object Enumeration Vulnerability

CVE-2009-3389.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey Theora Video Library Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3389.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey are prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability that attackers can exploit to cause denial-of-service conditions and possibly to execute arbitrary code.NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 37349 (Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey MFSA 2009-65 through -71 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been assigned its own record to better document it.

CVE-2009-3431.title: Adobe Acrobat Stack Exhaustion Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3431.body: Adobe Acrobat is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the affected application to crash, effectively denying service. Attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.Acrobat 9.1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.NOTE: This BID was previously classified as a buffer-overflow issue, but further analysis reveals that it is a stack-exhaustion issue. Code execution is unlikely.

CVE-2009-3434.title: Joomla!/Mambo Tupinambis Component SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3434.body: The Tupinambis component ('com_tupinambis') for Joomla! and Mambo is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Tupinambis 1.0 is affected; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3435.title: Drupal Devel Module Variable Editor HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3435.body: The Devel module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Devel 6.x-1.18 and 5.x-1.2 are affected.

CVE-2009-3436.title: MaxWebPortal 'forum.asp' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3436.body: MaxWebPortal is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-3437.title: Drupal Markdown Preview Module Live Preview HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3437.body: The Markdown Preview module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Markdown 6.x is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3438.title: Joomla! JoomlaFacebook Component SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3438.body: The JoomlaFacebook component ('com_facebook') for Joomla! is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-3442.title: Drupal Meta tags (Nodewords) Module Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3442.body: The Drupal Meta tags (Nodewords) module is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability because it fails to adequately enforce access permissions.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the application; other attacks may also possible. Versions prior to Meta tags (Nodewords) 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3444.title: e107 News Email Referer Header Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3444.body: The 'e107' program is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2009-3446.title: Joomla! MyRemote Video Gallery 'user_id' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3446.body: The MyRemote Video Gallery component for Joomla! is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.MyRemote Video Gallery 1.0 Beta is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3448.title: BakBone NetVault Backup 'npvmgr.exe' Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3448.body: BakBone NetVault Backup is affected by a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can leverage this issue by sending specially crafted network packets.NetVault Backup 8.22 Build 29 is vulnerable; other versions may be affected as well.

CVE-2009-3453.title: IBM Lotus Quickr Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3453.body: IBM Lotus Quickr is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.The issues affect Lotus Quickr services 8.1.0 for the WebSphere Portal.

CVE-2009-3457.title: Cisco Application Control Engine (ACE) XML Gateway IP Address Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3457.body: Cisco Application Control Engine (ACE) XML Gateway is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that can aid in further attacks.This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug CSCtb82159.Versions prior to ACE XML Gateway 6.1 and ACE Web Application Firewall 6.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3458.body: Adobe has released an advisory for Acrobat and Reader that addresses 24 new security issues. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow attackers to crash the affected application, execute arbitrary code within the context of the application, bypass certain security restrictions, and compromise the affected computer. Other attacks are also possible. These issues affect versions *prior to* Reader and Acrobat 7.1.4, 8.1.7, and 9.2.The following individual records now exist to document these issues:36664 Adobe Reader and Acrobat Multiple Input CVE-2009-3459.title: Adobe Acrobat Reader Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3459.body: Adobe Acrobat Reader is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by supplying a malicious PDF file. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running the affected application. Failed attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2009-3463.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Multiple Remote Code Execution and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3463.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is prone to a multiple remote code-execution and denial-of-service vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user and to cause denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to Shockwave Player 11.5.2.602 for Microsoft Windows and Apple Mac OS X are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3464.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Multiple Remote Code Execution and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3464.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is prone to a multiple remote code-execution and denial-of-service vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user and to cause denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to Shockwave Player 11.5.2.602 for Microsoft Windows and Apple Mac OS X are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3465.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Multiple Remote Code Execution and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3465.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is prone to a multiple remote code-execution and denial-of-service vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user and to cause denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to Shockwave Player 11.5.2.602 for Microsoft Windows and Apple Mac OS X are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3466.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Multiple Remote Code Execution and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3466.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is prone to a multiple remote code-execution and denial-of-service vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user and to cause denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to Shockwave Player 11.5.2.602 for Microsoft Windows and Apple Mac OS X are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3469.title: IBM Lotus Connections 'simpleSearch.do' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3469.body: IBM Lotus Connections is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacksIBM Lotus Connections 2.0.1 is affected; other versions may be vulnerable as well.

CVE-2009-3470.title: IBM Informix Dynamic Server JDBC Long Password Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3470.body: IBM Informix Dynamic Server (IDS) is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability.Exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to trigger denial-of-service conditions.The issue affects versions prior to IDS 10.00.xC11, 11.10.xC4, and 11.50.xC5.

CVE-2009-3474.title: OpenSAML 'use' Key Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3474.body: OpenSAML is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because of an error in verifying website certificates.Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2009-3476.title: OpenSAML URI Handling Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3476.body: OpenSAML is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized buffer.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of an application that uses the library. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to OpenSAML 1.1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3477.title: BlackBerry Device Software Browser Dialog Box Certificate Mismatch Weakness
CVE-2009-3477.body: The BlackBerry Device Software browser is prone to a weakness that may cause affected users to trust malicious sites.This issue may potentially lead to other attacks, because users may operate under a false sense of security.This issue affects all versions prior to BlackBerry Device Software 4.5.0.173, 4.6.0.303, 4.6.1.309, 4.7.0.179, and 4.7.1.57.NOTE: This issue affects all built-in browsers installed on BlackBerry devices: BlackBerry Browser Internet Browser WAP Browser Wi-Fi (Hotspot) Browser

CVE-2009-3479.title: Drupal Bibliography Module 'title' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3479.body: The Bibliography module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Note that to exploit this issue, the attacker must have sufficient privileges to create content displayed by the Bibliography module.Versions prior to Bibliography Module 6.x-1.6 and 5.x-1.17 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3480.title: iCRM Basic Joomla! Component Security Bypass and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3480.body: iCRM Basic is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability and an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input.Exploiting the security-bypass issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. The attacker can exploit the SQL-injection issue by manipulating the SQL query logic to carry out unauthorized actions on the underlying database. This may compromise the application and may aid in further attacks.iCRM Basic 1.4.2.31 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3488.title: Drupal Bibliography Module Biblio Item HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3488.body: The Bibliography module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Note that to exploit this issue, the attacker must have sufficient privileges to create content displayed by the Bibliography module.The issue affects Bibliography 6.x-1.6; other versions may also be affected. NOTE: This issue may be related to the vulnerability described in BID 35865 (Drupal Bibliography Module 'title' HTML Injection Vulnerability). We will update or retire this BID when more information becomes available.

CVE-2009-3490.title: Wget NULL Character CA SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3490.body: Wget is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate the domain name in a signed CA certificate, allowing attackers to substitute malicious SSL certificates for trusted ones. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks. Wget 1.11.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3505.title: Vastal I-Tech MMORPG 'view_news.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3505.body: MMORPG is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-3513.body: PG eTraining is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. CVE-2009-3691.title: IBM Informix Products Setnet32 Utility '.nfx' File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3691.body: Multiple IBM Informix products are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. This issue affects the following: IBM Informix Client Software Development Kit (CSDK) 3.5 IBM Informix Connect 3.x Other products that use the Setnet32 3.50.0.13752 utility may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3696.title: phpMyAdmin SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3696.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to an SQL-injection issue and a cross-site scripting issue because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to phpMyAdmin 2.11.9.6 and 3.2.2.1 are affected.

CVE-2009-3697.title: phpMyAdmin SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3697.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to an SQL-injection issue and a cross-site scripting issue because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to phpMyAdmin 2.11.9.6 and 3.2.2.1 are affected.

CVE-2009-3699.title: IBM AIX 'rpc.cmsd' Calendar Daemon Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3699.body: IBM AIX is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges, which can result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-3700.title: squidGuard Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3700.body: squidGuard is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities.Attackers can leverage these issues to bypass certain security restrictions such as URI filters and perform unauthorized actions.squidGuard 1.3 and 1.4 are vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3701.title: Horde Application Framework Administration Interface 'PHP_SELF' Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3701.body: Horde Framework is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.This issue affects versions prior to Horde 3.3.6.Note that additional products that use the Horde framework may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3719.title: Battle Blog SQL Injection and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3719.body: Battle Blog is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability and an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage the HTML-injection issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is viewed, and launch other attacks. The attacker may exploit the SQL-injection issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Battle Blog 1.25 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3722.title: Linux Kernel KVM 'handle_dr()' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3722.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability that affects the Kernel-based Virtual Machine (KVM) subsystem.Attackers in guest systems can exploit this issue to crash the affected host system, denying service to legitimate users.Versions prior to 2.6.31.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3725.title: Linux Kernel Subsystem Connector Missing Capability Check Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3725.body: The Linux kernel is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities because of missing capability checks in several subsystem connectors.Local attackers can exploit these issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions such as changing certain configurations. Successful exploits may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2009-3726.title: Linux Kernel 'nfs4_proc_lock()' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3726.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the kernel to panic, denying service to legitimate users.Versions prior to Linux kernel 2.6.31-rc4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3727.title: Asterisk SIP Response Username Enumeration Remote Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3727.body: Asterisk is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability because it doesn't provide safe responses to failed authentication attempts.Attackers can exploit this issue to discover whether specific usernames exist. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2009-3731.title: WebWorks Help Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3731.body: WebWorks Help is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because the software fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied inputAn attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.The following products include the vulnerable application:ePublisher 2009.2 ePublisher 2009.1 ePublisher 2008.4 ePublisher 2008.3 ePublisher 2008.2 ePublisher 2008.1 ePublisher 9.3 ePublisher 9.2 ePublisher 9.1 ePublisher 9.0WebWorks Publisher 8WebWorks Publisher 7WebWorks Publisher 6ESX 4.0 without patch ESX400-200911223-UGvCenter 4.0 GAVMware Server 2.0.2VMware Lab Manager 2.xVMware vCenter Lab Manager 3.xVMware vCenter Lab Manager 4.0VMware vCenter Stage Manager 1.xComputer Associates SiteMinder 6.0 SP4 and prior

CVE-2009-3733.title: VMware Products Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3733.body: VMware products are prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because they fail to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input data.Exploiting the issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information from the host operating system that could aid in further attacks.

CVE-2009-3735.title: Panda ActiveScan 'as2stubie.dll' ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3735.body: Panda ActiveScan ActiveX control is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Attackers may exploit this issue by enticing unsuspecting victims to view a malicious webpage. Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application that uses the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer).Panda ActiveScan 2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3745.title: IBM Rational AppScan Help Pages Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3745.body: IBM Rational AppScan is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2009-3747.title: TBmnetCMS 'content' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3747.body: TBmnetCMS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.This issue affects TBmnetCMS 1.0; other versions may be vulnerable as well.

CVE-2009-3751.title: Opial Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3751.body: Opial is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including an SQL-injection issue, a cross-site scripting issue, and a file-upload issue.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- access or modify data- exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database- obtain sensitive information- gain unauthorized access to the affected application- upload arbitrary files and execute arbitrary server-side script code- execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected siteA successful attack will compromise the application and may help in further attacks.The issues affect Opial 10; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3752.title: Opial Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3752.body: Opial is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including an SQL-injection issue, a cross-site scripting issue, and a file-upload issue.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- access or modify data- exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database- obtain sensitive information- gain unauthorized access to the affected application- upload arbitrary files and execute arbitrary server-side script code- execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected siteA successful attack will compromise the application and may help in further attacks.The issues affect Opial 10; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3753.title: Opial Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3753.body: Opial is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including an SQL-injection issue, a cross-site scripting issue, and a file-upload issue.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- access or modify data- exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database- obtain sensitive information- gain unauthorized access to the affected application- upload arbitrary files and execute arbitrary server-side script code- execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected siteA successful attack will compromise the application and may help in further attacks.The issues affect Opial 10; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3757.title: Citrix XenCenterWeb Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3757.body: Citrix XenCenterWeb is prone to the following input-validation vulnerabilities: - Multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities- Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities - Multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities- A remote command-execution vulnerabilityExploiting these issues could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, perform unauthorized actions, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-3758.title: Citrix XenCenterWeb Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3758.body: Citrix XenCenterWeb is prone to the following input-validation vulnerabilities: - Multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities- Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities - Multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities- A remote command-execution vulnerabilityExploiting these issues could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, perform unauthorized actions, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-3759.title: Citrix XenCenterWeb Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3759.body: Citrix XenCenterWeb is prone to the following input-validation vulnerabilities: - Multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities- Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities - Multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities- A remote command-execution vulnerabilityExploiting these issues could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, perform unauthorized actions, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-3760.title: Citrix XenCenterWeb Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3760.body: Citrix XenCenterWeb is prone to the following input-validation vulnerabilities: - Multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities- Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities - Multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities- A remote command-execution vulnerabilityExploiting these issues could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, perform unauthorized actions, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-3778.title: Drupal Moodle Course List Module Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3778.body: The Moodle Course List module for Drupal is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to Moodle Course List 6.x-1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3779.title: Drupal vCard  Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3779.body: The vCard module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.This issue affects the following:vCard 6.x prior to 6.x-1.3vCard 5.x prior to 5.x-1.4

CVE-2009-3780.title: Drupal Abuse Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3780.body: The Abuse module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.This issue affects the following:Abuse 6.x prior to 6.x-1.1-alpha1Abuse 5.x prior to 5.x-2.1

CVE-2009-3781.title: Drupal FileField Module Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3781.body: The FileField module for Drupal is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability because it fails to restrict access to certain files.Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.The issue affects FileField 6.x-3.1.

CVE-2009-3782.title: Drupal Userpoints Module 'userpoint' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3782.body: The Userpoints module for Drupal is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability because it fails to restrict access to certain portions of the affected application.Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.Versions prior to Userpoints 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3783.title: Drupal Simplenews Statistics Module Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3783.body: The Simplenews Statistics module for Drupal is prone to multiple vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage these issues to perform unauthorized actions, modify user profile settings, perform phishing attacks, and execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible.These issues affect versions prior to Simplenews Statistics 6.x-2.0.

CVE-2009-3784.title: Drupal Simplenews Statistics Module Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3784.body: The Simplenews Statistics module for Drupal is prone to multiple vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage these issues to perform unauthorized actions, modify user profile settings, perform phishing attacks, and execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible.These issues affect versions prior to Simplenews Statistics 6.x-2.0.

CVE-2009-3785.title: Drupal Simplenews Statistics Module Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3785.body: The Simplenews Statistics module for Drupal is prone to multiple vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage these issues to perform unauthorized actions, modify user profile settings, perform phishing attacks, and execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible.These issues affect versions prior to Simplenews Statistics 6.x-2.0.

CVE-2009-3786.title: Drupal Organic Groups Vocabulary Group Title HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3786.body: The Organic Groups Vocabulary module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Organic Groups Vocabulary 5.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3786.title: Drupal Organic Groups Vocabulary Group Title HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3786.body: The Organic Groups Vocabulary module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Organic Groups Vocabulary 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3788.title: OpenDocMan Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3788.body: OpenDocMan is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.OpenDocMan 1.2.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3789.title: OpenDocMan Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3789.body: OpenDocMan is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. CVE-2009-3793.title: Adobe Flash Player (CVE-2009-3793) Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3793.body: Adobe Flash Player and AIR are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Very few technical details are currently available. We will update this BID as more information emerges. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks may cause a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 40759 (Adobe Flash Player 10.0.45.2 and AIR 1.5.3.9130 Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2009-3794.body: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities, multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities, and an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information, crash an affected application, and execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Other attacks may also be possible.The following products are affected:Adobe Flash Player 10.0.32.18 and prior Adobe AIR 1.5.2 and priorThis BID is being retired. CVE-2009-3830.title: Microsoft SharePoint Team Services Download Feature Source Code Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3830.body: Microsoft SharePoint is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers access certain files that contain source code.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to retrieve certain files from the vulnerable computer in the context of the webserver process. Information obtained may aid in further attacks.SharePoint 2007 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3831.title: Opera Web Browser prior to 10.01 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3831.body: Opera Web Browser is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code, bypass certain security restrictions, or perform spoofing attacks.Versions prior to Opera 10.01 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3832.title: Opera Web Browser prior to 10.01 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3832.body: Opera Web Browser is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code, bypass certain security restrictions, or perform spoofing attacks.Versions prior to Opera 10.01 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3834.title: Joomla! 'com_photoblog' Component 'category' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3834.body: The 'com_photoblog' component for Joomla! is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-3835.title: Joomla! 'com_jshop' Component 'pid' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3835.body: The 'com_jshop' component for Joomla! is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2009-3838.title: Pegasus Mail POP3 Response Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3838.body: Pegasus Mail is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition.Pegasus Mail 4.51 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3844.title: HP OpenView Data Protector Application Recovery Manager Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3844.body: HP OpenView Data Protector Application Recovery Manager is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.OpenView Data Protector Application Recovery Manager 5.50 and 6.0 are vulnerable.NOTE: The vendor reports this as a denial-of-service vulnerability, but further information suggests that the issue can be exploited to execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2009-3846.title: RETIRED: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3846.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities: - Multiple remote command-injection vulnerabilities. - Multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities.- Multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities.- An additional unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability.An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: This BID is being retired.
