CVE-2009-3889.title: Linux Kernel 'megaraid_sas' Driver Insecure File Permission Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3889.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability that stems from a design error. This vulnerability occurs because the software assigns insecure file permissions to the 'megaraid_sas' driver.An attacker may exploit this issue to affect kernel driver behavior and logging level. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2009-3895.title: libexif 'exif-entry.c' Tag Format Conversion Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3895.body: The 'libexif' library is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of an application using the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service vulnerability.

CVE-2009-3896.title: nginx 'ngx_http_process_request_headers()' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3896.body: The 'nginx' program is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-3897.title: Dovecot Insecure 'base_dir' Permissions Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3897.body: Dovecot is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.A local attacker can exploit this issue to log in as another user, which may aid in further attacks.Versions prior to Dovecot 1.2.8 are affected.

CVE-2009-3899.title: Sun Solaris Sockets Direct Protocol (SDP) Driver 'sdp(7D)' Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3899.body: Sun Solaris is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because of an error in the Sockets Direct Protocol (SDP) driver 'sdp(7D)'. Exploiting this issue allows attackers to exhaust kernel memory, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2009-3902.title: Cherokee Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3902.body: Cherokee is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input data.Exploiting the issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks.Cherokee 0.5.4 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3903.title: ManageEngine NetFlow Analyzer 'jspui/index.jsp' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3903.body: ManageEngine NetFlow Analyzer is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.ManageEngine NetFlow Analyzer 7.5 build 7500 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3904.title: CubeCart 'admin.php' Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3904.body: CubeCart is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately verify user-supplied input used for authentication.Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to gain administrative access, which may aid in further attacks.Versions prior to CubeCart 4.3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3909.title: GIMP PSD Image Parsing Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3909.body: GIMP is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. This issue affects GIMP 2.6.7; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-3911.title: TFTgallery 'sample' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3911.body: TFTgallery is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.This issue affects TFTgallery 0.13; other versions may be vulnerable as well.

CVE-2009-3913.title: RETIRED: Xerox Fiery WebTools 'summary.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3913.body: Xerox Fiery WebTools is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.NOTE: This BID is being retired. The vendor indicates that since this product doesn't use an underlying database, SQL injection is impossible.

CVE-2009-3914.title: Drupal Temporary Invitation Module 'Name' Field HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3914.body: The Temporary Invitation module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Temporary Invitation 5.x-2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3915.title: Drupal Link Module 'Link Title' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3915.body: The Link module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to the following are vulnerable:Link 5.x-2.6Link 6.x-2.7http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2009-3916.title: Drupal Node Hierarchy Module Node Title HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3916.body: The Node Hierarchy module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Node Hierarchy 5.x-1.3 and 6.x-1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3917.title: Drupal S5 Presentation Player Module HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3917.body: The S5 Presentation Player module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to S5 Presentation Player 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3918.title: Drupal Zoomify Module 'node title' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3918.body: The Zoomify module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to the following are vulnerable:Zoomify 6.x-1.4Zoomify 5.x-2.2

CVE-2009-3919.title: Drupal NGP COO/CWP Integration Module Security Bypass and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3919.body: Drupal NGP COO/CWP Integration module is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, or perform unauthorized actions; other attacks may also be possible.Versions prior to NGP COO/CWP Integration 6.x-1.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3920.title: Drupal NGP COO/CWP Integration Module Security Bypass and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3920.body: Drupal NGP COO/CWP Integration module is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, or perform unauthorized actions; other attacks may also be possible.Versions prior to NGP COO/CWP Integration 6.x-1.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3921.title: Drupal Smartqueue OG Confirmation Message Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3921.body: The Smartqueue OG module for Drupal is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability that may allow attackers to perform actions without proper authorization.Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions to obtain sensitive information or perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2009-3922.title: Drupal User Protect Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3922.body: Drupal User Protect is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability.Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions, gain unauthorized access to the affected application, or delete certain data. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2009-3923.title: Sun Virtual Desktop Infrastructure Authentication Mechanism Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3923.body: Sun Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability.Exploiting this issue could allow remote attackers to gain unauthorized access to the VirtualBox web service. Successful exploits may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2009-3931.title: Google Chrome prior to 3.0.195.32 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3931.body: Google Chrome is prone to a security-bypass issue and a memory-corruption issue.Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass certain security checks, trick users into executing scripts in the local context, execute arbitrary code in the context of the browser, and cause a denial-of-service condition; other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Chrome 3.0.195.32 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-3936.title: Multiple Citrix Products Unspecified SSL/TLS Certificate Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3936.body: Multiple Citrix products are prone to a vulnerability that may allow attackers to spoof an SSL or TLS endpoint.Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to impersonate a legitimate server to bypass intended authentication protections. Other attacks may be possible.The following products are affected:Citrix Online Plug-in for Windows prior to 11.0.150 and 11.2Citrix Online Plug-in for Mac prior to 11.0Citrix Receiver for iPhone prior to 1.0.3ICA Client for XenAppICA Client for XenDesktop

CVE-2009-3937.title: Sun Solaris TCP Sockets Local Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3937.body: Sun Solaris is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability in TCP sockets.Local attackers may exploit this issue to cause the system to hang.

CVE-2009-3938.title: Poppler 'ABWOutputDev.cc'  Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3938.body: Poppler is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because the library fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running an application that relies on the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-3939.title: Linux Kernel 'megaraid_sas' Driver Insecure File Permission Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3939.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability that stems from a design error. This vulnerability occurs because the software assigns insecure file permissions to the 'megaraid_sas' driver.An attacker may exploit this issue to affect kernel driver behavior and logging level. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2009-3951.title: RETIRED: Adobe Flash Player APSB09-19 Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-3951.body: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities, multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities, and an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information, crash an affected application, and execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Other attacks may also be possible.The following products are affected:Adobe Flash Player 10.0.32.18 and prior Adobe AIR 1.5.2 and priorThis BID is being retired. CVE-2009-3953.body: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code. CVE-2009-3955.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat JpxDecode Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3955.body: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code. CVE-2009-3958.body: NOS Microsystems getPlus Helper ActiveX control is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. CVE-2009-3959.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat U3D Support Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3959.body: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by supplying a malicious PDF file or webpage. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running the affected application. Failed attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 37667 (Adobe Acrobat and Reader January 2010 Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities), but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2009-3976.title: ProFTP 'Welcome Message' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3976.body: ProFTP is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. CVE-2009-3980.body: Mozilla Firefox is prone to multiple remote memory-corruption vulnerabilities.Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. CVE-2009-3987.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey are prone to a COM object enumeration vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting victim to view a malicious webpage. Successful exploits will allow attackers to enumerate a list of COM objects installed on the affected computer and create a profile to track the user over browsing sessions. NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 37349 (Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey MFSA 2009-65 through -71 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been assigned its own record to better document it.

CVE-2009-3989.title: Bugzilla Directory Access Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3989.body: Bugzilla is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Exploits may allow attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information that may aid in other attacks.Versions prior to Bugzilla 3.0.11, 3.2.6, 3.4.5, and 3.5.3 are affected.

CVE-2009-3994.title: DevIL DICOM File Handling Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3994.body: DevIL is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running an application that relies on the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. This issue affects DevIL 1.7.8; other versions may be vulnerable as well.

CVE-2009-3999.title: HP Power Manager 'formExportDataLogs' Buffer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-3999.body: HP Power Manager is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges, resulting in a complete compromise of the affected computer. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: This BID initially referenced CVE-2009-4000. This issue is now described in BID 37873.Versions prior to Power Manager 4.2.10 are affected.

CVE-2009-4000.title: HP Power Manager 'formExportDataLogs' Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4000.body: HP Power Manager is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this issue to overwrite arbitrary files and execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges, resulting in a complete compromise of the affected computer. Versions prior to Power Manager 4.2.10 are affected.

CVE-2009-4001.title: XnView DICOM Image Processing Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4001.body: XnView is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.Versions prior to XnView 1.97.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4002.title: Adobe Shockwave Player (CVE-2009-4002) Unspecified Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4002.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is prone to an unspecified remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to Shockwave Player 11.5.1.606 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4003.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Multiple Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4003.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is prone to multiple integer-overflow vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to Shockwave Player 11.5.2.606 for Microsoft Windows and Apple Mac OS X are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4004.title: Linux Kernel KVM 'KVM_MAX_MCE_BANKS' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4004.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability that affects the Kernel-based Virtual Machine (KVM).Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers. Versions prior to Linux kernel 2.6.32-rc7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4005.title: Linux Kernel 'hfc_usb.c' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4005.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability that is caused by a read buffer overflow.Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.Versions prior to Linux kernel 2.6.32-rc7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4006.title: RhinoSoft Serv-U FTP Server TEA Decoder Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4006.body: RhinoSoft Serv-U FTP Server is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.Serv-U 9.0.0.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4009.title: PowerDNS Recurser Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4009.body: PowerDNS is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it into a fixed-length buffer.Successfully exploiting this issue allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges, resulting in a complete compromise of the affected computer. Failed exploits will cause a denial of service.

CVE-2009-4012.title: LibThai Unspecified Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4012.body: The 'LibThai' library is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of an application using the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service vulnerability.

CVE-2009-4013.title: Debian Lintian Multiple Local Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4013.body: Debian Lintian is prone to multiple local vulnerabilities:- Multiple directory-traversal vulnerabilities- Multiple format-string vulnerabilities- An arbitrary-command-execution vulnerability Local attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code and commands with elevated privileges and obtain sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2009-4015.title: Debian Lintian Multiple Local Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4015.body: Debian Lintian is prone to multiple local vulnerabilities:- Multiple directory-traversal vulnerabilities- Multiple format-string vulnerabilities- An arbitrary-command-execution vulnerability Local attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code and commands with elevated privileges and obtain sensitive information. CVE-2009-4023.body: PEAR is prone to a remote argument-injection vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input data.Remote attackers can exploit this issue to pass arbitrary arguments to the 'sendmail' command. This may allow attackers to obtain the contents of arbitrary files or launch other attacks.The issue affects PEAR 1.1.14; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4024.title: PEAR Net_Ping 'ping()' Function Arbitrary Argument Injection Vulnerability

CVE-2009-4031.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability that affects the Kernel-based Virtual Machine (KVM).Local attackers can exploit this issue to cause excessive scheduling latency, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2009-4032.title: Cacti Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4032.body: Cacti is prone to multiple cross-site-scripting and HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. CVE-2009-4111.body: PEAR is prone to a remote argument-injection vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input data.Remote attackers can exploit this issue to pass arbitrary arguments to the 'sendmail' command. This may allow attackers to obtain the contents of arbitrary files, overwrite arbitrary files, or launch other attacks.The issue affects PEAR 1.1.14; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4112.title: Cacti 'Linux - Get Memory Usage' Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4112.body: Cacti is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability because the software fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input.Successful attacks can compromise the affected software and possibly the computer.

CVE-2009-4114.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 'kl1.sys' Driver Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4114.body: Kaspersky Anti-Virus is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges and completely compromise the affected computer. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2010 9.0.0.463 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4119.title: Drupal Feed Element Mapper Module Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4119.body: The Feed Element Mapper module for Drupal is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Feed Element Mapper 5.x-1.3 and 6.x-1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4120.title: Quick.Cart and Quick.CMS Delete Function Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4120.body: Quick.Cart and Quick.CMS are prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because the applications allow users to bypass certain security checks.Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions, gain unauthorized access to an affected application, or delete certain data. Other attacks are also possible.Quick.Cart 3.4 and Quick.CMS 2.4 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.NOTE: The vendor refutes this issue stating the issue can not be replicated as described.

CVE-2009-4121.title: Quick.Cart and Quick.CMS Delete Function Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4121.body: Quick.Cart and Quick.CMS are prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because the applications allow users to bypass certain security checks.Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions, gain unauthorized access to an affected application, or delete certain data. Other attacks are also possible.Quick.Cart 3.4 and Quick.CMS 2.4 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.NOTE: The vendor refutes this issue stating the issue can not be replicated as described.

CVE-2009-4124.title: Ruby 'rb_str_justify()' Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4124.body: Ruby is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied data.Successful exploits may allow attackers to run arbitrary code in the context of applications implemented with Ruby. Failed exploit attempts may result in denial-of-service conditions.The issue affects Ruby 1.9.1 (prior to 1.9.1-p376).

CVE-2009-4128.title: GNU GRUB Local Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4128.body: GNU GRUB is prone to a local authentication-bypass vulnerability.A local attacker with physical access to an affected host can exploit this issue to bypass authentication. This may aid in the complete compromise of the affected system.GNU GRUB 1.97 is affected; other versions may be vulnerable as well.

CVE-2009-4131.title: Linux Kernel  Ext4 'move extents' ioctl Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4131.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability because the software fails to verify access permissions.Exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges and launch other attacks.Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.

CVE-2009-4134.title: Python 'rgbimg' Module ZSIZE Value Buffer Underflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4134.body: Python's 'rgbimg' module for Python is prone to a buffer-underflow vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of applications using the vulnerable Python modules. This may result in a compromise of the underlying system. Failed attempts may lead to a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-4138.title: Linux Kernel 'drivers/firewire/ohci.c' NULL Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4138.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected kernel, denying service to legitimate users. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2009-4141.title: Linux Kernel 'fasync_helper()' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4141.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges.Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.The Linux Kernel 2.6.28 and later are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4142.title: PHP 'htmlspecialcharacters()' Malformed Multibyte Character Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4142.body: PHP is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.NOTE: In some configurations, attackers may exploit this issue to carry out HTML-injection attacks.Versions prior to PHP 5.2.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4144.title: NetworkManager Security Bypass and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4144.body: NetworkManager is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability and an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit theses issues to obtain sensitive information or entice a user to connect to a network without certificate verification.NetworkManager 0.7.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4145.title: NetworkManager Security Bypass and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4145.body: NetworkManager is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability and an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit theses issues to obtain sensitive information or entice a user to connect to a network without certificate verification.NetworkManager 0.7.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4146.title: FreeBSD 'execl()' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4146.body: FreeBSD is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with root privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.FreeBSD 7.0-RELEASE through 8.0-RELEASE are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4147.title: FreeBSD 'execl()' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4147.body: FreeBSD is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with root privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.FreeBSD 7.0-RELEASE through 8.0-RELEASE are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4151.title: RT Session Fixation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4151.body: RT is prone to a session-fixation vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to hijack a user's session and gain unauthorized access to the affected application.The issue affects RT 3.0.0 through 3.8.5.

CVE-2009-4168.title: WordPress WP-Cumulus Plugin 'tagcloud.swf' Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4168.body: The WP-Cumulus plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to WP-Cumulus 1.23 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4168.title: Joomla! Joomulus Component 'tagcloud.swf' Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4168.body: The Joomulus component for Joomla! is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2009-4171.title: Yahoo! Messenger 'YahooBridgeLib.dll' ActiveX Control Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4171.body: Yahoo! Messenger is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because of a NULL-pointer dereference error.A successful attack allows a remote attacker to crash the application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer), denying further service to legitimate users. Given the nature of this issue, the attacker may also be able to run arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.Yahoo! Messenger 9.0.0.2162 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4172.title: CuteNews and UTF-8 CuteNews Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4172.body: CuteNews and UTF-8 CuteNews are prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including cross-site scripting, HTML-injection, information-disclosure, arbitrary-script-injection, and security-bypass issues.Note that exploits for some of the issues may require administrator privilege.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- obtain sensitive information- gain unauthorized access to the affected application- run arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site- hijack user sessions- execute arbitrary commands in the context of the webserver processA successful attack will compromise the application and may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2009-4173.title: CuteNews and UTF-8 CuteNews Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4173.body: CuteNews and UTF-8 CuteNews are prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including cross-site scripting, HTML-injection, information-disclosure, arbitrary-script-injection, and security-bypass issues.Note that exploits for some of the issues may require administrator privilege.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- obtain sensitive information- gain unauthorized access to the affected application- run arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site- hijack user sessions- execute arbitrary commands in the context of the webserver processA successful attack will compromise the application and may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2009-4174.body: CuteNews and UTF-8 CuteNews are prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including cross-site scripting, HTML-injection, information-disclosure, arbitrary-script-injection, and security-bypass issues.Note that exploits for some of the issues may require administrator privilege.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- obtain sensitive information- gain unauthorized access to the affected application- run arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site- hijack user sessions- execute arbitrary commands in the context of the webserver processA successful attack will compromise the application and may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2009-4175.body: CuteNews and UTF-8 CuteNews are prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including cross-site scripting, HTML-injection, information-disclosure, arbitrary-script-injection, and security-bypass issues.Note that exploits for some of the issues may require administrator privilege.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- obtain sensitive information- gain unauthorized access to the affected application- run arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site- hijack user sessions- execute arbitrary commands in the context of the webserver processA successful attack will compromise the application and may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2009-4176.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities: - Multiple remote command-injection vulnerabilities. - Multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities.- Multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities.- An additional unspecified remote code-execution vulnerability.An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 37261 (HP OpenView Network Node Manager Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities), but has been assigned its own record to better document it.

CVE-2009-4185.title: HP System Management Homepage Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4185.body: HP System Management Homepage is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.This issue affects versions prior to HP System Management Homepage 6.0 on Windows and Linux platforms.

CVE-2009-4186.title: Apple Safari CSS Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4186.body: Apple Safari is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to handle exceptional conditions.An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Safari 4.0.3 for Windows is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4187.title: Sun Java System Portal Server Multiple Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4187.body: Sun Java System Portal Server is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Java System Portal Server 6.3.1, 7.1, and 7.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4195.title: Adobe Illustrator Encapsulated Postscript File Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4195.body: Adobe Illustrator is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting victim to open a malicious Encapsulated PostScript file.Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition.This issue affects Illustrator CS4 14.0.0 and CS3 13.0.0; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4196.title: Huawei MT882  Cross Site Scripting and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4196.body: Huawei MT882 is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and an information-disclosure vulnerability.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The attacker may also obtain sensitive information. Huawei MT882 firmware 3.7.9.98 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4203.title: Arab Portal 'X-Forwarded-for' Header SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4203.body: Arab Portal is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Arab Portal 2.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4207.title: Drupal Webform Module HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4207.body: The Webform module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in dynamically generated content.Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Webform 5.x-2.7 and 6.x-2.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4210.title: Intel Indeo Codec Media Content Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4210.body: Intel Indeo Codec is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability and a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2009-4211.title: Security Readiness Review Evaluation Scripts Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4211.body: Department of Defense Security Readiness Review Evaluation Scripts are prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.Security Readiness Review Evaluation Scripts dated October, 2009 and December, 2009 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2009-4212.title: MIT Kerberos AES and RC4 Decryption Integer Underflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4212.body: MIT Kerberos is prone to multiple integer-underflow vulnerabilities because it fails to properly handle malformed encrypted data.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Failed attacks will result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Kerberos 5 1.6.4 and 1.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4214.title: Ruby on Rails 'strip_tags()' Non-Printable Character Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4214.body: Ruby on Rails is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.NOTE: In some configurations, attackers may exploit this issue to carry out HTML-injection attacks.Versions prior to Ruby on Rails 2.3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2009-4216.title: klinza professional cms 'menulast.php' Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4216.body: The 'klinza professional cms' project is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to compromise the application and the underlying system; other attacks are also possible.This issue affects 'klinza professional cms 5.0.1' and prior versions.

CVE-2009-4218.title: Multiple JiRo's Products 'files/login.asp' Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities

CVE-2009-4225.body: CA eTrust PestPatrol Anti-Spyware 'ppctl.dl' ActiveX control is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Successful exploits will compromise the application and the computer. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.This issue affects 'ppctl.dll' 5.6.7.9.

CVE-2009-4239.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2009-4239.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. CVE-2009-4240.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server Multiple Unspecified Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2009-4240.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application or to cause denial-of-service conditions.These issues may present remote or local threats; no further details are currently available. CVE-2009-4249.body: CuteNews and UTF-8 CuteNews are prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including cross-site scripting, HTML-injection, information-disclosure, arbitrary-script-injection, and security-bypass issues.Note that exploits for some of the issues may require administrator privilege.Successful exploits may allow attackers to:- obtain sensitive information- gain unauthorized access to the affected application- run arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site- hijack user sessions- execute arbitrary commands in the context of the webserver processA successful attack will compromise the application and may aid in further attacks.

A successful exploit may facilitate the compromise of the affected computer.Ghostscript 8.64 and 8.70 are affected; other versions may be vulnerable as well.
